member.name: T:RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSChecker
member.summary: RDFSKOSChecker is responsible for implicit SKOS validation of ontologies during modeling

member.name: M:RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSChecker.CheckBroaderRelation(RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConceptScheme,RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConcept,RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConcept)
member.summary: Checks if the skos:broader/skos:broaderTransitive/skos:broadMatch relation can be added to the given aConcept with the given bConcept

member.summary: Checks if the skos:narrower/skos:narrowerTransitive/skos:narrowMatch relation can be added to the given aConcept with the given bConcept

member.summary: Checks if the skos:related/skos:relatedMatch relation can be added to the given aConcept with the given bConcept

member.name: M:RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSChecker.CheckCloseOrExactMatchRelation(RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConceptScheme,RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConcept,RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConcept)
member.summary: Checks if the skos:closeMatch/skos:exactMatch relation can be added to the given aConcept with the given bConcept

member.name: M:RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSChecker.CheckPrefLabel(RDFSharp.Semantics.LinkedData.SKOS.RDFSKOSConceptScheme,RDFSharp.Semantics.RDFOntologyFact,RDFSharp.Semantics.RDFOntologyLiteral)
member.summary: Checks if the skos:prefLabel/skosxl:prefLabel informations can be added to the given concept
